20110111025322.000|20110111025329.000|CC1|AND WHY THE TUCSON HEROES.      
20110111025329.000|20110111025331.000|CC1|THEIR TRUE GRIT.                
20110111025331.000|20110111025619.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20110111025331.000|20110111025331.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20110111025331.000|20110111025334.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20110111025334.000|20110111025334.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20110111025334.000|20110111025337.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20110111025337.000|20110111025339.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20110111025339.000|20110111025340.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20110111025340.000|20110111025340.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20110111025340.000|20110111025342.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20110111025342.000|20110111025342.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20110111025342.000|20110111025345.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20110111025345.000|20110111025345.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20110111025345.000|20110111025347.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20110111025347.000|20110111025349.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20110111025349.000|20110111025349.000|CC1|            by helping          
20110111025349.000|20110111025350.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20110111025350.000|20110111025350.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20110111025350.000|20110111025353.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20110111025353.000|20110111025353.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20110111025353.000|20110111025356.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20110111025356.000|20110111025356.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20110111025356.000|20110111025358.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20110111025358.000|20110111025358.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110111025358.000|20110111025400.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20110111025400.000|20110111025400.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20110111025400.000|20110111025402.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20110111025402.000|20110111025403.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20110111025403.000|20110111025403.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20110111025403.000|20110111025406.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20110111025406.000|20110111025406.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20110111025406.000|20110111025407.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20110111025407.000|20110111025409.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20110111025409.000|20110111025409.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20110111025409.000|20110111025411.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20110111025411.000|20110111025411.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20110111025411.000|20110111025413.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20110111025413.000|20110111025413.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20110111025413.000|20110111025415.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20110111025415.000|20110111025417.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20110111025417.000|20110111025417.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20110111025417.000|20110111025419.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20110111025419.000|20110111025419.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20110111025419.000|20110111025421.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20110111025421.000|20110111025421.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20110111025421.000|20110111025424.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20110111025424.000|20110111025424.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20110111025424.000|20110111025425.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20110111025425.000|20110111025425.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20110111025425.000|20110111025428.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20110111025428.000|20110111025428.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20110111025428.000|20110111025430.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20110111025429.000|20110111025429.000|XDS|%   LENGTH: 1:20:00 of 1:30:00
20110111025430.000|20110111025432.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20110111025432.000|20110111025434.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20110111025434.000|20110111025434.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially
